mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, GUT_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, GUT_REQ_ODR AS calleeReqChasu, GUT_REQ_GBN AS calleeReqGubun, GUT_ODR_GBN AS calleeChasuGubun, HANDLE_RESULT AS handleResult, HANDLE_FAIL_REASON AS handleFailReason, AS_METHOD AS asMethod, HANDLE_DATETIEM AS handleDatetime, HANDLE_EMP_NAME AS handleEmpName, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO AS handleEmpTelno, HANDLE_CONTENT_CD AS handleContentCode, HANDLE_UNUSL AS handleUnusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo FROM ATMS_01001150

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, GUT_REQ_SEQ_NO AS calleeReqSeqNo, GUT_REQ_ODR AS calleeReqChasu, GUT_REQ_GBN AS calleeReqGubun, GUT_ODR_GBN AS calleeChasuGubun, HANDLE_RESULT AS handleResult, HANDLE_FAIL_REASON AS handleFailReason, AS_METHOD AS asMethod, HANDLE_DATETIEM AS handleDatetime, HANDLE_EMP_NAME AS handleEmpName, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO AS handleEmpTelno, HANDLE_CONTENT_CD AS handleContentCode, HANDLE_UNUSL AS handleUnusl, CRT_NO AS crtNo FROM ATMS_01001150 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001150 WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_01001150 SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, GUT_REQ_SEQ_NO = #{calleeReqSeqNo}, GUT_REQ_ODR = #{calleeReqChasu}, GUT_REQ_GBN = #{calleeReqGubun}, GUT_ODR_GBN = #{calleeChasuGubun}, HANDLE_RESULT = #{handleResult}, HANDLE_FAIL_REASON = #{handleFailReason}, AS_METHOD = #{asMethod}, HANDLE_DATETIEM = #{handleDatetime}, HANDLE_EMP_NAME = #{handleEmpName}, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO = #{handleEmpTelno}, HANDLE_CONTENT_CD = #{handleContentCode}, HANDLE_UNUSL = #{handleUnusl}, CRT_NO = #{crtNo} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001150 ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, ERROR_DATETIME, GUT_REQ_SEQ_NO, GUT_REQ_ODR, GUT_REQ_GBN, GUT_ODR_GBN, HANDLE_RESULT, HANDLE_FAIL_REASON, AS_METHOD, HANDLE_DATETIEM, HANDLE_EMP_NAME, HANDLE_EMP_TELNO, HANDLE_CONTENT_CD, HANDLE_UNUSL, CRT_NO ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeReqSeqNo}, #{calleeReqChasu}, #{calleeReqGubun}, #{calleeChasuGubun}, #{handleResult}, #{handleFailReason}, #{asMethod}, #{handleDatetime}, #{handleEmpName}, #{handleEmpTelno}, #{handleContentCode}, #{handleUnusl}, #{crtNo} )
